channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Samsung's 12 best Super Bowl TV deals that I recommend buying — up to $1,200 off 4K, QLED, and OLED TVs
item.description: Samsung's Super Bowl TV sale is live, and I'm rounding up today's 12 best deals I recommend for watching the big game, including up to $1,500 off 4K, QLED, and OLED TVs.

item.title: Test ViewSonic M1B Max : le mini vidéoprojecteur portable Google TV à moins de 500 euros
item.description: Le ViewSonic M1B Max est un vidéoprojecteur Full HD 1080p portable avec batterie, Google TV et pied inclinable sur 360 degrés. Voici notre test complet pour savoir s’il peut devenir votre compagnon cinéma du quotidien.

item.title: I tested the three most popular Nintendo Switch 2 cameras, and this is the only one I’d recommend
item.description: I’ve tested three cameras for Nintendo Switch 2, but there’s only one model I’d spend my own money on.

item.title: I used to ignore my bank account but with this app I’m in control of every cent
item.description: Homescreen Heroes: YNAB has rewired my relationship with money

item.title: ‘Jujutsu Kaisen’ Keeps Looking So Damn Good
item.description: An evolving art style has helped each 'Jujutsu Kaisen' season feel distinct and stun viewers during its many, *many* fights.

item.title: Ce pack tout en 1 permet de voir qui est à la porte, de surveiller son intérieur et son extérieur avec 62 % de remise pour les soldes
item.description: Si l'idée d'équiper son logement en caméras de surveillance traîne dans un coin de la tête, les soldes sont le bon moment de passer à l'action. C'est le cas de ce pack signé Arlo, qui réunit une sonnette connectée et deux caméras, dont une est pensée pour l'intérieur et l'autre pour l'extérieur. Avec 62 % de réduction chez Darty, le prix de ce bundle passe de 399,99 euros à 149,99 euros. ...

item.title: Why Minnesota Can't Do More to Stop ICE
item.description: Democratic lawmakers have few options that wouldn't trigger something like civil war.

item.title: OpenAI promises to keep Stargate data center costs down - so your utility bills shouldn't go sky high...probably
item.description: OpenAI’s Stargate plan funds local energy infrastructure to prevent electricity bill spikes while supporting large-scale AI tools.

item.title: New, Smarter Siri Is Reportedly Weeks from Arriving. It Had Better Be Amazing
item.description: Apple is borrowing tech from Google to try and score a much-needed win. But Google wins either way.

item.title: Apple, Garmin, Samsung : notre sélection des meilleures montres connectées en 2026
item.description: Vous voulez craquer sur une smartwatch ? Galaxy Watch, Pixel Watch, Apple Watch, Garmin ou encore Withings. Voici notre sélection des meilleures montres connectées testées par notre rédaction pour accompagner votre smartphone Android ou votre iPhone.

item.title: Conversational AI doesn’t understand users — 'Intent First' architecture does
item.description: The modern customer has just one need that matters: Getting the thing they want when they want it. The old standard RAG model embed+retrieve+LLM misunderstands intent, overloads context and misses freshness, repeatedly sending customers down the wrong paths. Instead, intent-first architecture uses a lightweight language model to parse the query for intent and context, before delivering to the most relevant content sources (documents, APIs, people).Enterprise AI is a speeding train headed for a cliff. Organizations are deploying LLM-powered search applications at a record pace, while a fundamen...

item.title: Apple reportedly plans to reveal its Gemini-powered Siri in February
item.description: A new and improved Siri may finally make an appearance, but this time, it could be with a Google Gemini glow up. According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, Apple wants to announce a new Siri in "the second half of February" that will show off the results of its recently announced partnership with Google and offer demonstrations of the Gemini-powered capabilities. After this reveal, Gurman reported that the new Siri will make its way to iOS 26.4, which is also slated to enter beta testing in February before its public release in March or early April. Apple has been meaning to launch its next-gen Sir...

item.title: Creators and communities everywhere take a stand against ICE
item.description: It's not surprising when the guy who's been yelling about the horrors of late-stage capitalism on Instagram for the last five years turns his ire towards ICE. But something different has been happening over the week or so, following the most recent shootings of civilians by federal agents - even accounts that stay laser focused […]
